name: Euro City taxi Driver: The extreme Snow Driving
name_original: Euro City taxi Driver: The extreme Snow Driving
description:
Travel through the different cities and drive throughout the city from one location to another but this time on a Cab as an elite taxi driver in Euro City taxi Driver: The extreme Snow Driving. Drive through busy rush hours, extreme weather conditions, city streets, Skyscrapers, multistory high rise buildings and many more. The passengers are waiting to ride with you and have a unique and on time traveling experience.
With Euro City taxi Driver: The extreme Snow Driving game you have to handle and drive the unique cabs throughout different challenging and exciting traffic and weather conditions. The traffic will be unpredictable and you have to drive from one point to another with the passengers on board and drop them on their respective destinations on time. The weather will also test your driving and time management skills. You will drive in rainy, slippery and snowy conditions, so be careful and avoid being hit, crashes and accidents otherwise you will damage your car and miss your destination on time. You have to maintain your reputation as an elite and supreme cab driver in these conditions, to be on time and reach safe and sound.
So download Euro City taxi Driver: The extreme Snow Driving game and enjoy the amazing task & mission base city taxi driving game. You must pic & drop your customer/ passenger to their destination on time and without any harm. The cab is waiting for you and city people are waiting for you to travel with!
Game Features:
1) Amazing 3D graphics and environment
2) Addictive and Challenging Cab Driving Missions
3) Smooth and Easy car driving controls
